name: Gabito Ballesteros
description: '''Gabriel "Gabito" Ballesteros Abril''' (born 23 July 1999) is a Mexican singer-songwriter, rapper and record producer. He is considered one of the rising acts in the ''[[corridos tumbados]]'' movement, following in the footsteps of artists such as [[Peso Pluma]], [[Natanael Cano]], and [[Junior H]]. He is best known for collaborating with these artists on singles such as "[[AMG (song)|AMG]]" in 2022 and "[[Lady Gaga (song)|Lady Gaga]]" in 2023, both of which charted on the [[Billboard Hot 100|'' Billboard'' Hot 100]] and reached number 1 in Mexico. Ballesteros also collaborated with [[Becky G]] in the 2023 single, "[[La Nena (song)|La Nena]]".
